name: MB Labs
description: MB LABS was created by professionals with great experience in software development, who have challenged themselves to establish a new level of excellence in this market. Although young, the company has already collected a number of projects that were very successful in its execution and maintenance. Combining creativity and relaxation with the most modern methods of project development and management, MB LABS delivers exactly what their customers want.

locations.address: Avenida Prof. Ana Maria Silvestre Adade, 393
